title: What if everyone bought UHD Blu-rays? - Quora

response.answer_text: We’d still be in the middle of this COVID-19 pandemic, Donald Drumpf would still be president, the sun will still rise in the morning and set in the evening, and the companies that own the concerns that make 4K TVs and Ultra HD Blu-ray players and the studios that distribute the discs will probably have slightly better quarterly profits. In other words, the world would go on like it always has. The addition of a new disc player hardly counts as life-changing.
Lots of blu rays would be bought and the companies would make a fortune from it. These types of questions don't make sense.
